definitions.definition: ( intransitive ) To feel a prickling or mildly stinging sensation .
examples: My hands were tingling from the cold.
I got hit in the butt yesterday, and it still tingles .

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To cause to feel a prickling or mildly stinging sensation.
examples: Tingle your tastebuds with these exotic dishes.

definitions.definition: ( intransitive ) To ring ; to tinkle or twang .
( transitive ) To cause to ring, to tinkle .

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To feel a prickling or mildly stinging sensation .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To cause to feel a prickling or mildly stinging sensation.
( intransitive ) To ring ; to tinkle or twang .
( transitive ) To cause to ring, to tinkle .

definitions.definition: To fasten with a tingle; to tack .
To patch with a tingle; to cover a hole in something that needs to be watertight.
To secure the middle of a guide line by means of a tingle.

main_definition: To fasten with a tingle; to tack .
secondary_definitions: To patch with a tingle; to cover a hole in something that needs to be watertight.
( masonry ) To secure the middle of a guide line by means of a tingle.
